about_the_game:
The scale was also large, the quality was good, and the visuals were really good, so this is my personal favorite project

Made by one person, and I worked on everything from the drawings to the code, except for the music;;

Beta-tested with about 150 or more testers

Project-Wak is a 2D action RPG in the Soulslike genre, offering challenging gameplay and immersive mechanics. It combines exploration, strategic combat, and a rich narrative to deliver a dynamic and engaging experience. Below are the key elements of its gameplay and mechanics:

1. Exploration and Environment

• Interconnected World: The game uses a side-scrolling design, allowing players to explore diverse areas with dark and detailed atmospheres.

• Secrets and Challenges: Richly detailed environments and hidden paths encourage careful exploration to discover rewards and shortcuts.

2. Combat and Strategy

• Soulslike Combat: The gameplay emphasizes precision and patience, focusing on dodges, well-timed attacks, and stamina management.

• Enemy Variety: Players face challenging foes with unique attack patterns, requiring adaptation and learning.

• Skills and Weapons: The game may include various weapons and abilities that affect how players approach combat.

3. Progression and RPG Elements

• Character Upgrades: Progression likely includes skill or equipment upgrades, allowing customization of play styles.

• Immersive Story: A deep narrative is integrated into exploration and combat, providing emotional context to the player’s actions.

4. Visual Style and Atmosphere

• Pixel Art Style: The stylized pixel art reinforces the game’s identity and melancholic atmosphere.

• Sound Design: The soundtrack and sound effects complement the mood, enhancing immersion【11】【12】.

Project-Wak combines classic Soulslike elements with a creative 2D approach, making it a promising title for fans of challenging RPGs.
